about_the_game:
Moonshine? BORING! You will cook MOLESHINE! Grow ingredients in your garden, make moonshine and upgrade it with the main ingredient - a pesky MOLE that wants to eat your crop!

You got a ruined, abandoned farm, which is constantly raided by stubborn moles who want to eat your crops! Clear rubble, fix your garden and plant different crops to make the most unusual types of moonshine! Don't forget about pest control, defend your crops with your own hands, or build a solid defense system!

Game Features:

  • Go through the entire process of making moonshine with unique recipes that you have to discover
  • Farm life management, repair, upgrade and sow
  • Defend your farm from mole attacks on your own or with the help of a variety of defensive means
  • Sell ​​the finished product and spend the proceeds on the farm

Dont forget to:

name: Moleshine Cooking Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 660
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 8
  • Processor: 2.5 ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 1050ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
